Client: Ludus Alliance - smart martial art equipment, Israel


Services: Website Design | Art & Illustration | Motion Design


The Challenge: Create a web experience that combines the company’s value of innovation with seemingly competing values of spirit & myth that are at the heart of the martial arts culture.


Ludus Materials manufactures smart equipment that, for the first time, provides accurate data about the fighter’s performance (speed, power, stamina etc).

The system is to the martial arts what the stop watch is to athletics – a tool for universal standardization that can unify and empower the whole martial art world.


Creative Director and Artist - Sagi Rechter

Website Designer - Einav Blum

Website Developers - Ludus Materials and Starry Byte

Motion Artists - Roy Manor and Rechter Design
